item.title: CVE-2021-41038|2024-08-04T02:59:30.930Z -- the%20eclipse%20foundation -- %40theia%2Fplugin-ext
item.description: In versions of the @theia/plugin-ext component of Eclipse Theia prior to 1.18.0, Webview contents can be hijacked via postMessage().
